short_summary: Development and operation of Oracle's Financials (ERP) system solutions
description: Oracle E-Business Suite 12.2.7 is used at Transport Canada for managing financial transactions, including accounts payable and receivable, and general ledger.
full_summary:
**Development and Operation of Oracle Financials (ERP) Common System Solutions**
=====================================

**Procurement ID:** cb-819-15275470
**Status:** Expired
**Solicitation ID:** T8080-230181
**Publication Date:** September 25, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 17, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

**Overview:**
Transport Canada (TC) has a requirement for managerial, functional, and technical system support services to maintain, develop, and operate the Oracle Financials (ERP) common system solutions. The services are essential for the effective management of all financial transactions.

**Eligibility:**
This tender is open exclusively to Tier 1 TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified in the National Capital Region for services in the category specified.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful supplier will provide ongoing support for the Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) 12.2.7, encompassing modules such as Accounts Payable (AP), Accounts Receivables (AR), and General Ledger (GL). The services will include system maintenance, development, and effective operation of the Oracle Financials (ERP) common system solutions.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Key Dates:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: November 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2024

**Regions of Opportunity:**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**
Transport Canada

**Contact Information:**
Barbara Gorman
barbara.gorman@tc.gc.ca
(343) 550-2175

**Tender Documents:**
[English version (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20507/npp-english-t8080-230181.pdf)
[Français version (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20507/npp-francais-t8080-230181_0.pdf)

**Compliance with Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to various free trade agreements, including but not limited to Canada-Panama, Canada-Peru, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). Suppliers must comply with all applicable agreements. 131 days_project last modified 12
